001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
004
005/**
006 * Interface for transaction fee calculation.
007 */
008public interface FeeCalculator {
009    /**
010     * Calculate the fee for an almost-complete transaction. The proposed transaction
011     * should contain all inputs and outputs. Typically, this means having a change output
012     * with a value of {@link Coin#ZERO}. After calculating the correct fee the change output
013     * should be updated with the correct amount.
014     *
015     * @param proposedTx A nearly-complete proposed transaction.
016     * @return A recommended fee for this transaction.
017     */
018    Coin calculateFee(SigningRequest proposedTx);
019}
